title: [gameplay] Azir wandering around during sandsoldier attacks
body:
i've found that, at unpredictable times, azir appears to move he when auto attacks through a randomly spawned sand soldier. He either moves: toward the target until he is right next to them; away from the target until he is unable to attack; or in a random direction. This issue begins when the sand soldier spawns and continues until the sand soldier expires. 
The issue appears tied to a specific sand soldier as when two are spawned, with the first one being bugged, the issue only occurs when a target is attacked with a bugged sand soldier, even if an unbugged soldier is attacking at the same time.

This issue has occured in co-op vs AI and custom games modes.

replies.body:
Hey python 159! 

Thanks for the report! 

We're aware of a lingering bug where Azir can start automatically moving after issuing soldier attack commands. However, because movement is canceled by other inputs and Azir is a high-input champion, we feel it didn't warrant leaving Azir disabled. It'll be fixed next patch!

I don't know how much information you guys have on this, but here is a link to my thread on this bug that I made previously. There is more about the bug, how to make it happen, etc.
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/tA4vv1jn-azir-sand-soldier-aa-causes-champ-to-move-awkwardlyrandomly
I believe we know what's causing it, but I'd be happy to pass this along. Thanks for the additional info! :]

I'm sorry for being the bearer of bad news, but it is enough reason to disable him. 
When you can't attack anyone for 10 minutes of a 21 minute game because every time you try you run around like a flounder, you're left feeling pretty abused by the end of the game. And I'm saying this 9 hours after playing him, and I'm still struggling to resist uninstalling the game because I literally CRIED over it.
